5006.quoteText:
You are allowed to use a
pseudonym if you so choose
5006.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.tldr: "You are allowed to use a pseudonym if you so choose; we only use your name as a 'friendly' alternative to your username."

5007.quoteText:
If we find objectionable content, it will be removed.
Examples of such content: pornography, hate speech, pro-abortion or pro-gay
“marriage” propaganda, illegal or illicit activities, and questionable drug use
5007.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: You agree not to submit illegal content
tosdr.tldr: "illegal or illicit activities" is listed under the section "Some content is banned."

5008.quoteText:
Sometimes we do take a peek to make sure everything goes smoothly for all our
users, but we never tell anyone what we find (unless we find something very
illegal
5008.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis
tosdr.tldr: "We will never sell your information to anybody, because it belongs to you, not us.  Sometimes we do take a peek to make sure everything goes smoothly for all our users, but we never tell anyone what we find (unless we find something very illegal)."

5009.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: Written in plain English and broken into clear sections.

5010.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
tosdr.tldr: Lists pornography under the section "Some content is banned."

5011.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: You can retrieve an archive of your data
tosdr.tldr: "If you wish to have your personal information removed from our systems, you want a copy of your data, or you want to change your information but can't find a way to do so, contact us and we will be happy to assist you."

5012.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data
tosdr.tldr: "If you wish to have your personal information removed from our systems, you want a copy of your data, or you want to change your information but can't find a way to do so, contact us and we will be happy to assist you."

5013.quoteText:
We are not responsible in any way for the activities of
users on our online services
5013.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users

tosdr.case: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
tosdr.tldr: "We are not responsible in any way for the activities of users on our online services."

5014.quoteText:
If you are misusing, abusing,
or putting a large amount of strain on our systems, we will ask you to stop
or to pay a small usage fee.
If you disregard our requests, we reserve the
right to terminate your account or otherwise block your access
5014.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

5015.quoteText: We are not liable if bad stuff happens, even if it’s our software’s fault
5015.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality

tosdr.case: No guarantee is given regarding quality
tosdr.tldr: "Netsyms Technologies’ digital products and services are provided by the copyright holders and contributors "as is" and any express or implied warranties..."

5016.quoteText:
Analytical
data does not move outside Netsyms servers, and you cannot be identified with
it
5016.title: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking

tosdr.case: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
tosdr.tldr: "Analytical data does not move outside Netsyms servers, and you cannot be identified with it.  If you don't want to be tracked at all, enable Do-Not-Track in your web browser or [click here](https://netsyms.com/tracking-opt-out/) to opt out."

5017.quoteText:
If you wish to have
your personal information removed from our systems, you want a copy of your
data, or you want to change your information but can’t find a way to do so,
contact us and we will be happy to assist you
5017.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
tosdr.tldr: "If you wish to have your personal information removed from our systems, you want a copy of your data, or you want to change your information but can't find a way to do so, contact us and we will be happy to assist you."

5018.quoteText: We will attempt to notify you via email of any major changes to this document.
5018.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
tosdr.tldr: "We will attempt to notify you via email of any major changes to this document."

5020.quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with
services
5020.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

tosdr.case: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
tosdr.tldr: "We only retain data as needed to provide you with services."

5021.quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with
services.
We never log historical location data.
any such data we receive
overwrites the older data.
Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs
no longer than one month
5021.title: User logs are deleted after 30 days

tosdr.case: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
tosdr.tldr: "Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs no longer than one month."
